alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 3:37AM CST until January 15 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cedar and Wayne Counties. * WHEN...Light freezing rain or sleet is possible Friday morning. Snow begins Friday afternoon and continues through 3 AM Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and periods of reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
